resources.string:
"DISCLAIMER This app contains stories and images published on third party sources. We are not responsible for any or all of its content. This app is distributed as "as-is" without warranty of any kind and user may use at his/her own risk. 
 This app user and third parties agree to indemnify and hold harmless this app's creator and its agent from any damages claimed as a result of information, This app doesnt stream the content itslef, so the creator cant be held responsible for any damage. 
 If anybody still finds this app harmfull in any way, they must send a request to the creator first to remove the discrepancy. 
 The developer can be reached out at puneet739@gmail.com"
